name: Everything Bagel Tofu
description: Everything Bagel Tofu! Crispy Baked Tofu Seasoned with Everything but the bagel seasoning. Serve this Baked Everything Tofu with vegan ranch or hot sauce. Vegan Nut-free Oil-free Recipe, Can be Gluten-free

video.name: EVERYTHING BAGEL TOFU | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Crispy Baked Tofu Seasoned with Everything but the bagel seasoning. Serve this Baked Everything Tofu with vegan ranch or hot sauce.
FULL RECIPE : https://www.veganricha.com/2019/10/everything-bagel-tofu.html

These easy tofu sticks are breaded with a mix of breadcrumbs and everything bagel seasoning. You can buy some premixed seasoning or make your own, see post! Then batter and bread the tofu and bake. Crunchy, Delicious and so fun! Perfect to snack on, for the game day, for parties or as a side, or add to tacos or wraps! 
These Everything Bagel Tofu Sticks can be made without Oil and gluten.

#veganricha #easyveganrecipes #everythingbageltofu #crispytofu #veganappetizer #vegansuperbowl

MY BOOKS:
INDIAN KITCHEN (Best-Seller):  https://veganricha.com/vegan-richas-indian-kitchen-cookbook
EVERYDAY KITCHEN: https://veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen
Both have about 150 Recipes each. With many gluten-free, nut-free, soy-free recipes and options listed with recipes. Available everywhere Internationally as well.

Music: Run your way dvine - epidemic sound

recipeIngredient: 14 oz firm or super firm tofu
2 tbsp flour ((all purpose), Use rice flour or more starch for gluten-free)
2 tsp soy sauce (, tamari for gluten-free)
1/4 cup breadcrumbs (, see notes for gluten-free)

recipeInstructions.text: Press the Tofu in a tofu press or place between paper towels and top with a few books or similar heavy weight for 15 mins. Then slice into 1/2 inch fingers. Line a baking dish or sheet with parchment or grease with a bit of oil. Preheat the oven to 400 deg F (205 C).
recipeInstructions.name: Press the Tofu in a tofu press or place between paper towels and top with a few books or similar heavy weight for 15 mins. Then slice into 1/2 inch fingers. Line a baking dish or sheet with parchment or grease with a bit of oil. Preheat the oven to 400 deg F (205 C).

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the batter ingredients in a shallow bowl. Mix the breadcrumbs and bagel seasoning in another shallow bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the batter ingredients in a shallow bowl. Mix the breadcrumbs and bagel seasoning in another shallow bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Dip each tofu in the batter with one hand and transfer to the breading bowl. Use the other hand to coat with the seasoning mixture and place in the baking dish and inch away from each other. Spray oil on top (optional)
recipeInstructions.name: Dip each tofu in the batter with one hand and transfer to the breading bowl. Use the other hand to coat with the seasoning mixture and place in the baking dish and inch away from each other. Spray oil on top (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 400 deg F for 35 mins or until golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 400 deg F for 35 mins or until golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the crisp tofu with vegan ranch or vegan blue cheese dressing or hot sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve the crisp tofu with vegan ranch or vegan blue cheese dressing or hot sauce.
